attributes.additional_details: To review the selling and purchasing of products containing paracetamol as the guidelines are not clear and the regulation is making it quite difficult to purchase paracetamol products when someone is ill, some supermarkets in particular are taking this law  to extreme and refusing to sell more than two items even if there are two people present.Please sign this petition if you have ever found it difficult to purchase medicines containing paracetamol.Lets start being treated more like responsible adults.
